issue.title: [Rust] Merge utils from Parquet and Arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4064](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4064). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we maintain two set of utils, one in Parquet and one in Arrow. We should merge them and create a top level module for both components.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4064?focusedCommentId=16993752) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Is this still worth doing? My view is that there's little overlap in the various utils.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4064?focusedCommentId=17332017) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/33
